html: (2 Nephi 14:4)."Purged the blood of Jerusalem from the midst thereof by the spirit of judgment, and by the spirit of burning." All who are unholy will be purged from the earth at the Second Coming. They will be judged, found wanting, and burned or destroyed. (Malachi 3:2; 4:1; JST Matthew 13:29; BICQ, 194 98.)
